message_1: Consider the relevance logic formula R(x) → Q(x), where the domain of x is {1, 2, 3, 4}. Determine the truth value of R(2) → Q(2).
message_2: To determine the truth value of R(2) → Q(2), we need to know the truth values of R(2) and Q(2). However, the given information does not provide any details about the truth values of R(x) and Q(x) for any x in the domain. Therefore, we cannot determine the truth value of R(2) → Q(2) based on the given information.
